structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXI. PROTECTION OF PERSONS DISCLOSING SPECIFIED INFORMATION

text.section:
Sec. 2-967.3. Actions prohibited.
No County employee shall take any adverse action that affects the rights or interests of any person in retaliation for the person's disclosure of information under this article.
The provisions of this article shall not be applicable when a person discloses information known by the person to be false.
